profile_summary:
As an AI Software Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience, I excel in leveraging **Python**, **FastAPI**, and various **microservices architecture** techniques, alongside **event-driven architecture** to create innovative AI-driven applications. My skill set includes hands-on experience with **Kafka**, **SSE**, and **WebSocket** for real-time data transmission, enabling seamless integration of AI models such as **Large Language Models** and fine-tuning techniques for **GPT**, **Claude**, and **Gemini**. I have a solid understanding of **vector databases** including **OpenSearch** and **FAISS**, as well as developing **RAG systems** and AI agents leveraging **OpenAI Chat Completion** and **Assistant endpoints**.

In addition to my technical competencies, I possess strong problem-solving abilities, effective communication skills, and collaborative spirit. My previous projects include building robust enterprise applications that uphold compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, and I have experience in CI/CD automation to streamline deployment processes.
